title: Samanta T?na
text:
Samanta T?na
🇱🇻☀️Ar Vasaras Saulgriežiem! ☀️ Visīsākā 21.Jūnija nakts jau aiz muguras. Jāatzīst, ka tā bija nemiera pilna, laikam unguns ar savu enerģiju vainīgs! 🔥 Gan jau tas zina, kas un kāpēc tā, un ne savādāk! Lai Jums lustīgi un kustīgi!🌾 🇺🇸☀️It's midsummer!☀️ The Shortest 21st on June's night is ower. I must to admit that it was quite restless, seems that it's fires 🔥energies fault and it know why it's in the way it is! Enjoy this midsummers time!🌾 #midsummer #midsummersnight #energy #21stjune #longestday #shortestnight #nature #latviannature #samantatina #līgo2020 #saulgrieži #vasarassaulgrieži #igotthepower #mindset
179 6
